Html: hello i am new to the WPF world but i am learning quickly, i am attempting (for $#!ts and Giggles) to recreate and outlook 2k7 navigation pane for an application, i have a restyled tabcontrol that looks good enough but i can figure out how to get it to change the TabItem Grid as well as a Second Grid used for the Main Content. any help would be greatly appreciated.

This hands-on-lab might be useful: http://www.microsoft.com/switzerland/msdn/de/presentationfinder/detail.mspx?id=104056

They recreate the Outlook 2007 UI.

Have fun!

thanks this was a good start, after researching further i managed to find the english version of this lab. http://blogs.msdn.com/tims/archive/2007/06/13/wpf-hands-on-lab-build-an-outlook-2007-ui-clone.aspx just in case someone is interestied.

this lib may contain what you are searching

http://www.codeplex.com/odyssey (OutlookBar)
